page.title: 01INTRODUCTION: WARLEY, ESSEX
page.content: This block is centered on the village of Great Warley, and nearly all of it lies within London's{Green Belt, subject to strict{planning controls. Two main{radial routes to London,}the A12 and A127, cross it, as does London's Orbital Motorway, the{M25.}A high proportion of the area is {farmland,}with several{woodlands.}The north eastern part (Little Warley) is an extension of Brentwood: here{Ford's are the major employer.{Commuting to London is common. This survey examines the Geology, Landscape, Soil, and Streams. It then looks at the Natural Vegetation, Microclimate, Crops grown now and the previous land use. It then examines Employment, Housing and Shopping patterns, followed by a survey of Traffic and Leisure Amenities, and concludes with an analysis of Attitudes and Trends.
